courses.title: DSA
courses.description: This course introduces the fundamental concepts of data structures and algorithms, the building blocks of efficient programming. You’ll learn how to organize, store, and process data using structures like arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, and graphs. The course also covers essential algorithms for searching, sorting, and optimization, helping you understand how to write code that is both effective and scalable. By the end, you’ll be able to solve real-world problems, improve coding efficiency, and prepare for technical interviews with confidence.
